name: Satan's Zombies
description:
In Satans Zombies you are one of the last remaining survivors in the Zombie Apocalypse, and you're a badass bikie tearing through the highway of a megapolis shooting zombies and kicking rival bikers.

The game is similar to other endless runners but is more violent, contains a lot of blood, guns and action movie cameras.

The game is still currently in active development with new features and bug fixes coming everyday! We'd also like to get feedback from you guys to incorporate into the games development. Don't like something about it? Let us know!

What do YOU think? Let me know in reviews or contact me via twitter/email!
